post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Our client, located in Brampton , is seeking a Classic ASP Developer to join their team for a permanent opportunity.  The ideal candidate will have demonstrated expertise developing with Classic ASP and possess experience with various .NET technologies.

Requirements:

·         Associates Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience

·         Classic ASP development experience

·         3 or more years of experience in web application development (Full life cycle of web application development)

·         Experience in dynamic development processes in addition to traditional software development methodologies and processes

·         Agile, Scrum or Extreme programming experience (solution oriented development)

·         The ideal candidate will be able to think on their feet, possess good business judgment and be able to work on multiple projects simultaneously

·         Good written and verbal communication skills
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Nicole Padfield PROFESSIONAL RECRUITER

post.title: Classic ASP Developer
